comments.body:
https://github.com/eugenehp/react-native-uuid#getting-started shows that this should be available in global as well. So you want to add that to global and also add tests. 
Refer [this](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#how-do-i-write-definitions-for-packages-that-can-be-used-globally-and-as-a-module) for more details.
